item.title: Today I Learnt 13
item.description: India’s Covid-19 Emergency The situation is scary. Very scary. It has spread to the rural areas. There is severe lack of information and resources. There are a lot of quacks who can wreak havoc in the current climate of misinformation. The biggest fake Guru Ramdev has shown his true colors by blaming the victims of Covid-19 for all their breathing issues. We have RSS workers followed by our honorable PM dying without treatment.
